section.title: Titles
section.p: Titles with more than 55 characters get cut short in Google search results. If your title needs to be longer, frontload the important information.

section.title: Short descriptions
section.p: Accurately describe your page, emphasizing the value the user will get from your content. Descriptions longer than 164 characters get cut short in Google search results. If your description needs to be longer, frontload the important information.
